entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 6:30 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
